value:
$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|Princess Elincia, I regret that I must
trouble you during the festival... But
something strange is happening...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭エリンシア,ch09_06_Erincia_F_dance18,Face|What do you mean by "strange"?$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|It's Lady Micaiah. It seems her
behavior has become...wild.$k$pWe're hearing reports from all over
the festival. She's visited stall after
stall, devouring food...$k$pShe is now dancing on the festival
platform—dancing like a woman
possessed, by all accounts.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭エリンシア,ch09_06_Erincia_F_dance18,Face|There must be some mistake...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_summer18,Face|I find this difficult to believe, myself.
Though I've known her but briefly, I
would never have anticipated this...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|Have I missed something?$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|Lady Micaiah! You're here? Then
who is it sowing chaos in the festival?$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|I don't understand what it is you're
getting at! What's going on?$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|I see...$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|My truth is not your truth... Of course
you don't understand, Micaiah.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭エリンシア,ch09_06_Erincia_F_dance18,Face|Who are you?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|I am but a bird... A little bird flying
freely through the skies, singing
whatever tune she pleases...$k$pThis vortex is chaos itself... And I
can feel it pulling me in...$k$pCome and play! I've learned a new
song. "Oni, come to me... Follow the
sound of my clapping hands..."$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_summer18,Face|Now, wait a minute!$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|Another Lady Micaiah... Do you have
any idea who she is?$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|I don't... But, at the same time, she is
very familiar...$k$p$WmMPID_漆黒の騎士,ch09_08_BlackNight_M_Normal,Face|Be not alarmed, maiden.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|Sir Knight?! When did you—$k$p$WmMPID_漆黒の騎士,ch09_08_BlackNight_M_Normal,Face|I am not the knight you know. I reside
in the Tempest, in the chaos...$k$pMaiden, come with me. Come into the
depths of the Tempest. Your path
lies with the goddess of Chaos.$k$p

$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|It faded like mere mist... I did not
expect the Tempest to do that.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭エリンシア,ch09_06_Erincia_F_dance18,Face|It's almost gone...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|Fighting her, I came to understand
something, I think...$k$pFundamentally, she wasn't evil. It
was the Tempest that was driving
her actions.$k$pDeep down, she was just lonely...
She wanted to go to a festival
and be with people.$k$pThat's why she did what she did.$k$pPrince Ryoma, I must apologize on
her behalf. That behavior...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|There is no need for apologies, Lady
Micaiah. There was no malice in her.
She was simply young and free...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|Yes... Just like Yune, that free-
spirited child...$k$pAh! Yune! Quiet down, please! I'm
worn out... We went through so much
today.$k$p$WmMPID_漆黒の騎士,ch09_08_BlackNight_M_Normal,Face|Maiden?$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_dance18,Face|Sir Knight... That you should come to
us now is surely the will of the
goddess. I thank you for your aid.$k$p$WmMPID_漆黒の騎士,ch09_08_BlackNight_M_Normal,Face|The will of the goddess? Hmm...$k$pThere is nothing to fear. I believe you
will overcome all odds and become a
brilliant light for Daein.$k$pMove forever forward, Priestess of
Dawn...$k$p
